title: High School Community Health Worker Online Blended Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic health knowledge and digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: A blended learning program for high school students to improve community health, combining online theoretical learning with offline practical training.

learning_goals: Learners can explain CHW (Community Health Worker) core competencies: communication, health information delivery, and community resource linkage
Learners can develop action plans applying critical thinking and decision-making skills in health crisis situations
Learners can demonstrate methods for creating and sharing health education content using digital platforms
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
